title: Nx Module Federation Consumer (Host) Application
description: Create an Angular Consumer (Host) Module Federation Application.

examples.description: Create an Angular application with configuration in place for Module Federation. If the `remotes` option is provided, attach the Producer (remote) application to this application's configuration
Create an Angular application with configuration in place for Module Federation. If the `producers` option is provided, attach the Producer (remote) application to this application's configuration

directory.description: The directory of the new application.
directory.x-prompt: Which directory do you want to create the application in?

name.description: The name to give to the Consumer (host) Angular application.

remotes.description: The names of the Producers (remote) applications to add to the Consumer (host).

bundler.description: The bundler to use for the host application.

dynamic.description: Should the host application use dynamic federation?

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

x-prompt.message: Which stylesheet format would you like to use?

inlineStyle.description: Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipPostInstall.description: Do not add or append `ngcc` to the `postinstall` script in `package.json`.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests. `vitest-analog` uses AnalogJS-based setup with `@nx/vitest`. It defaults to `vitest-analog` for Angular versions >= 21.0.0, otherwise `jest`.
unitTestRunner.x-prompt: Which unit test runner would you like to use?

e2eTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for end to end (E2E) tests.
e2eTestRunner.x-prompt: Which E2E test runner would you like to use?

tags.description: Add tags to the application (used for linting).

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

backendProject.description: Backend project that provides data to this application. This sets up `proxy.config.json`.

strict.description: Create an application with stricter type checking and build optimization options.

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

addTailwind.description: Whether to configure Tailwind CSS for the application.

standalone.description: Whether to generate a Consumer (host) application that uses standalone components.

ssr.description: Whether to configure SSR for the Consumer (host) application

zoneless.description: Generate an application that does not use `zone.js`. It defaults to `true`. _Note: this is only supported in Angular versions >= 21.0.0_

typescriptConfiguration.description: Whether the module federation configuration and webpack configuration files should use TS.
